member.name: T:Sudoku.CodeGen.CodeAnalyzerAttribute
member.summary: To mark on a code analyzer type, to tell the compiler and the source generator that the type should generate the default values.

member.summary: Initializes a class instance using the specified ID list.
member.param: The ID list of all supported diagnostic results.

member.name: T:Sudoku.CodeGen.CodeFixProviderAttribute
member.summary: To mark on a code fixer type, to tell the compiler and the source generator that generates the code for the code fix defaults.

member.name: M:Sudoku.CodeGen.CodeFixProviderAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a class instance using the specified ID.
member.param: The ID of all supported diagnostic result.
